hero.title: Welcome to the
hero.subtitle: New Internet
hero.text: For every dreamer, creator, and change-maker tired of the old internet, Web3 is here. ENS is more than a protocol - it's a commitment to a better web, built for everyone.

features.title: Your name
features.text: Your ENS name is anchored in Web3, but works across the internet. It's your identity: simple, memorable, unmistakably yours.

farewell.title: Farewell to complexity.
farewell.text: No more confusing hex addresses. Your ENS name is easy to remember, easy to share.

animation.m1:
What's your crypto address so I can
pay you?
animation.m4:
This is so much simpler! Send to
mynewname.eth

consistent.title: Consistent across the internet.
consistent.text: Carry your identity across services and platforms with ease. Forget the hassle of multiple usernames.

ownership.title: True ownership.
ownership.text: Your ENS name is yours, period. No middlemen, no red tape. It's your property, uncensored - and irrevocable.

gyow.title: Go your own way
gyow.description: Find your unique path in the ENS ecosystem. No matter where you start, we're all going toward a better internet.

ens-app.title: ENS App
ens-app.description: Your ENS journey begins here, by registering your name.

ens-dao.title: ENS DAO
ens-dao.description: Join the ENS community to contribute alongside a global collective.

docs.title: Developer Docs
docs.description: You're a developer, and you want to build on the new internet.

gateway.title: Your gateway to the New Internet
gateway.description: Imagine a world where every product is interconnected between the internet and web3, creating a unified, innovative experience.

partners.description: These collaborators are raising the bar in improving the internet, establishing themselves as key partners with ENS.

governance.title: A public good, shaped by you
governance.description: ENS is more than a non-profit—it's a community-governed beacon of trust. Take part in shaping an internet where everyone has a voice.

hero.title:
Build in good
 company
hero.text: Whether you're a web3 newbie or a seasoned pro, we're inviting you to help craft a brighter web. ENS is more than just a protocol—it's a movement towards a trustless internet.

ensjs.description: The ultimate ENS javascript library, with viem under the hood.

ccip-read.description: The Cross Chain Interoperability Protocol (or CCIP Read for short), can load information by hitting a so called "Gateway".

evmgateway.description: This repository implements a generic CCIP-Read gateway for fetching state proofs of data on other EVM chains. The intended use is for contracts on L1 to be able to fetch and verify data from contracts on L2 in a read context.

thorin.description: Design system for ENS built with React and styled-components.

grants.title: Grants for Game-Changers
grants.text: Got a groundbreaking idea? Our grants are here to power your innovative projects within the ENS ecosystem.

bounty.title: Our Bug Bounty: Your Peace of Mind
bounty.text: We prioritize security above all. Explore our bug bounty program and contribute to a more secure platform with rewards up to $250,000.

hero.title: Trusted by the
hero.subtitle: New Internet
hero.text: ENS is a community of pioneers, collectively shaping a more intuitive and trustworthy internet. It's not just about being part of Web3; it's about leading it.

hero.title:
Your platform
for change
hero.text: Our DAO is the lifeblood of our decentralized ethos. Designed for longevity, the DAO nurtures ENS's resilience and flexibility, evolving through a tapestry of community voices.
